traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The eblis's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * 1/day each: blur, hypnotic pattern, minor illusion

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eblis attacks twice with its beak.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 +3) piercing damage.
